fields.helpText: You are taking over a registered business as a going concern if you are taking over the business without causing any significant break in trading and the business will continue to receive taxable premiums after the transfer date

declarationSection.title: Make your declaration and send the form

fields.label: test
fields.infoText: By submitting this registration you confirm that the information you have provided is true and complete.

HMRC have sent you a confirmation email. We will not contact you again unless we require further information.

If your application is successful, you should receive your certificate of registration within 3 weeks of submitting your form IPT1. This will give your IPT registration number and show your date of registration. It will also tell you when your first IPT return is due.

This is your last opportunity to print or save a pdf copy of your submitted form.
